Html: After upgrade to 0.8.2,  In debugger breakpoints are not hit!!! What to do?

Can you tell a bit more?  

Out of curiosity - if you uninstall using Add/Remove programs and then re-install 0.8.2, do you continue to see the issue?  I've noticed that uninstalling the old version in the Extensions and Updates in Visual Studio may not also clean out the debugging piece (this is something we're looking at simplifying in the future).
I discovered that the iis express configuration was the cause. My old project was configured with a port that somehow couldn't be opened.
